survey.users: __users__ người dùng đã hoàn thành khảo sát hiệu năng cho trò chơi này.
survey.framerate_30: cố định tại 30fps hoặc thấp hơn
survey.framerate_va: bất biến, phụ thuộc vào phần cứng
survey.resolution_support: Trò chơi này có hỗ trợ
survey.resolution_less: thấp hơn so với độ phân giải __pixels__
survey.gs_y: Has built-in graphic options or a graphics menu
survey.gs_n: Does not have built-in graphic options or a graphics menu
survey.nobody: Nobody has taken a performance survey for this game yet.

wsgf.unsupported: This score is awarded to games that have no __type__ support.  The game may be unplayable in __type__, or the image is stretched to fit the window.  Correct aspect ratio is not retained.
wsgf.gold: This medal is awarded to games which have received perfect scores from the WSGF for their __type__ support, and are __type__ Certified.
wsgf.silver: This medal is awarded to games that have received a calculated grade of B for their __type__ support.  All of these games are without major flaws, but have at least one blemish that prevents a perfect score.
wsgf.limited: This score is awarded to games that have received a calculated grade of C for their __type__ support.  All of these games have some level of __type__ support but have significant issues.

itad.option: Show menu option to sync data to IsThereAnyDeal.com
itad.sending: Loading your owned games and packages and sending them to IsThereAnyDeal.com

update.updated: Augmented Steam has been updated to __version__
update.changes: This release includes the following changes

register.owned: This Steam account already owns the product(s) contained in this offer.
register.notavail: Sorry, but this product is not available for purchase in this country.  Your product key has not been redeemed.
register.invalid: The product code you've entered is not valid.  Please double check to see if you've mistyped your key.
register.already: The product code you've entered has already been activated by a different Steam account.
register.dlc: The product code you've entered requires ownership of another product before activation.
register.wallet: Key bạn nhập là từ thẻ Steam Gift hoặc là mã Steam Wallet
register.toomany: There have been too many recent activation attempts from this account.  Please wait and try again later.
register.default: An unexpected error occurred.  Your product code has not been redeemed.  Please wait 30 minutes and try redeeming the code again.
